channel.title: Nether spawn
channel.description: Considering no1 actually spawns in the nether, could you remove it? I'm tired of trying to get from point a to point b and having to take a massive loop around an area where blocks are unplacable.

item.title: Nether spawn
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:5, topic:396849”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=494010.msg3611883#msg3611883 date=1306647912]

I don’t really know what you are talking about, but either way, the entire nether system will change when we upgrade to 1.6, since now it will be supported by the official server rather than hacked together with a mod.
[/quote]he means spawn protection for the second spawn area

I second this, it seems my nether portal spawns me on a floating platform above a huge pit of lava in the (almost) direct center of the nether spawn.[/quote]

Yea I tried to make a bridge to your nether portal and failed greatly after I placed dirt, then it dissapeared and I fell into lava.

Read full topic

[/quote]he means spawn protection for the second spawn area[/quote]
